advancement.aether.enchanted_gravitite.d: Use an Altar to obtain 神炼重力晶矿
advancement.aether.gravitite_armor.desc: Have a full set of gravitite armor in your inventory
advancement.aether.hammer_loot.desc: Obtain the Hammer of Kingbdogz from the 青铜地牢
advancement.aether.ice_accessory.desc: Use a Freezer and 冰石 to freeze an accessory
advancement.aether.lance_loot.desc: Obtain the 女武神长枪 from the 青铜地牢. Time to challenge the 白银地牢!
advancement.aether.loreception.desc: Put a Book of Lore inside a Book of Lore
advancement.aether.obsidian_armor.desc: Have a full set of obsidian armor in your inventory
advancement.aether.obtain_petal.desc: Harvest an Aechor Petal from an 箭毒花
advancement.aether.phoenix_armor.desc: Obtain a piece of 凤凰 armor from the 黄金地牢
advancement.aether.regen_stone.desc: Obtain a Regeneration Stone from the 白银地牢. The final dungeon awaits...
advancement.aether.valkyrie_hoe.desc: I defeated the 白银地牢 and all I got was this stupid锄
advancement.aether.valkyrie_loot.desc: Obtain a piece of 女武神 equipment from the 白银地牢
advancement.aether.zanite.desc: Have a 紫晶 Gemstone in your inventory
advancement.aether.zephyr_hammer.desc: Kill a 西风啸云 with the Hammer of Kingbdogz. Sweet Revenge!
aether.bronze_treasure_chest_locked: 该藏宝箱必须使用青铜钥匙开启
aether.gold_treasure_chest_locked: 该藏宝箱必须使用黄金钥匙开启
aether.life_shard_limit: You can only use a total of %s Life Shards.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.aerogel_expl: 气凝胶 acts as an explosion-resistant, transparent block.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.aether_day_l: Days in the Aether realm last 3 times longer than surface days.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.altar_repair: Altars can repair damaged items and enhance existing items.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.ambrosium_sh: 神能晶片s are great for fueling Altars.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.blue_aerclou: 天蓝境云s are bouncy, and launch mobs very high in the air.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.champs: The Champs and Champettes are pretty baller.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.check_surrou: Always check your surroundings before entering a fight.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.close_door: Don't leave your house without closing the door.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.cold_parachu: 寒风云落伞s can be crafted with 4 寒风境云 blocks.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.dart_shooter: Dart Shooters can be crafted with 天根木板 and 金琥珀.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.darts_no_gra: Golden, Poison, and Enchanted Darts are not affected by gravity.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.do_things: The best time to do anything is before it's too late.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.drops: If a drop looks too big, it probably is.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.dungeon_rewa: Dungeons can contain extremely powerful and unique rewards.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.dungeon_tier: Dungeons have various difficulties: from Bronze, Silver, to Gold.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.enchant_blue: Normal music discs can be enchanted into a blue version.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.enchanted_gr: 神炼重力晶矿 can be crafted into armor and tools.
神炼重力晶矿 only floats up when powered.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.expectations: Never expect that nothing will happen while you're gone.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.glowstone_po: Place water into a Glowstone frame for a Hostile Paradise.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.golden_apple: The leaves of 金橡木 trees occasionally drop Golden Apples.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.golden_oak_a: 金橡木 Trees yield valuable 金琥珀 in their logs.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.golden_parac: 金黄云落伞s have 20 uses rather than one.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.gravitite_ar: 重力晶 armor grants you higher jumps and no fall damage.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.gravitite_or: 重力晶矿石 can be enchanted into 神炼重力晶矿.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.gravitite_to: 重力晶 tools can levitate blocks when right-clicking.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.harvest_aech: You can harvest 箭毒花's poison with 天根木桶s.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.holystone_to: 圣石 tools occasionally generate 神能晶片s.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.icestone_fre: 冰石 freezes water into Ice and lava into 黑曜石.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.mimic_chest: Some dungeons in the Aether contain Chests which are 拟箱怪s.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.mining: You can always come back later and mine some more.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.moa_egg_incu: 恐鸟蛋s can be incubated into baby 恐鸟s with the Incubator.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.moa_nature_s: Baby 恐鸟s will stay put when right clicking them with a Nature Staff.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.parachute_ac: 云落伞s auto-activate when falling off an island.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.phoenix_armo: Try submerging yourself in water while wearing 凤凰 armor.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.phyg_saddle: Placing a Saddle on Flying Pigs makes them a mount.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.portal_miscl: Be careful not to misclick when building portals.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.quicksoil_sl: 速沙 increases the speed of walking mobs and sliding items.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.raw_meat: Raw meat is better than no meat.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.remedy_bucke: A 天根木 Remedy桶 for poison can be obtained by enchanting poison.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.risk_taking: Don't take huge risks far from home.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.security: Only give away your personal information to PayPal.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.sheepuff_puf: 云跳羊 occasionally puff their wool out, making them float.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.shelter: A shelter made of dirt is still a shelter.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.skyroot_tool: 天根木 tools gain double drops from blocks.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.spare_stack: Always keep a spare stack of blocks in your active inventory.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.the_game: The game is only as fun as you make it.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.victory_meda: When 女武神s are defeated they will drop a Victory Medal.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.watch_your_s: Watch where you step - deep shafts can be anywhere.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.white_aerclo: 寒风境云s prevent fall damage when landed upon.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.zanite_tool_: 紫晶 tools gain strength the more they are used.
aether.pro_tips.line.aether.zephyr_shoot: 西风啸云s shoot Snowballs with a force that can throw you off islands.
aether.silver_treasure_chest_locked: This 藏宝箱 must be unlocked with a 白银钥匙.
aether.sun_altar.in_control: The sun spirit is still in control of this realm.
aether.sun_altar.no_permission: You don't have permission to use this.
aether.sun_altar.no_power: The sun spirit has no power over this realm.
commands.aether.capability.player.life_s: Set life shard count for %s to %s
Player is already whitelisted to use the 日轮祭坛
Added %s to the 日轮祭坛's whitelist
commands.aether.sun_altar_whitelist.alre: 日轮祭坛's whitelist is already turned off
日轮祭坛's whitelist is already turned on
commands.aether.sun_altar_whitelist.disa: 日轮祭坛's whitelist is now turned off
commands.aether.sun_altar_whitelist.enab: 日轮祭坛's whitelist is now turned on
commands.aether.sun_altar_whitelist.relo: Reloaded the 日轮祭坛's whitelist
commands.aether.sun_altar_whitelist.remo: Player is not whitelisted to use the 日轮祭坛
Removed %s from the 日轮祭坛's whitelist
config.aether.client.audio.disable_aethe: Disables the Aether's menu music in case another mod implements its own, only works if 'Disables Aether music manager' is false
Disables the menu music on the Aether world preview menu, only works if 'Disables Aether music manager' is false
config.aether.client.audio.disable_music: Disables the Aether's internal music manager, if true, this overrides all other audio configs
config.aether.client.audio.disable_vanil: Disables the menu music on the vanilla world preview menu, only works if 'Disables Aether music manager' is false
config.aether.client.audio.music_backup_: Sets the maximum delay for the Aether's music manager to use if needing to reset the song delay outside the Aether
Sets the minimum delay for the Aether's music manager to use if needing to reset the song delay outside the Aether
config.aether.client.gui.align_aether_me: Aligns the elements of the Aether menu to the left, only works if 'Align menu left with world preview' is set to false
config.aether.client.gui.align_vanilla_m: Aligns the elements of the vanilla menu to the left, only works if 'Align menu left with world preview' is set to false
config.aether.client.gui.button_accessor: The x-coordinate of the accessories button in the accessories menu
The y-coordinate of the accessories button in the accessories menu
config.aether.client.gui.button_creative: The x-coordinate of the accessories button in the creative menu
The y-coordinate of the accessories button in the creative menu
config.aether.client.gui.button_inventor: The x-coordinate of the accessories button in the inventory and curios menus
The y-coordinate of the accessories button in the inventory and curios menus
config.aether.client.gui.default_aether_: Determines the default Aether menu style to switch to with the menu theme button
config.aether.client.gui.default_minecra: Determines the default Minecraft menu style to switch to with the menu theme button
config.aether.client.gui.disable_accesso: Disables the Aether's accessories button from appearing in GUIs
config.aether.client.gui.enable_aether_m: Changes the vanilla Minecraft menu into the Aether menu
Adds a button to the top right of the main menu screen to toggle between the Aether and vanilla menu
config.aether.client.gui.enable_quick_lo: Adds a button to the top right of the main menu screen to allow quick loading into a world if the world preview is enabled
config.aether.client.gui.enable_silver_h: Makes the extra hearts given by life shards display as silver colored
config.aether.client.gui.enable_trivia: Adds random trivia and tips to the bottom of loading screens
config.aether.client.gui.enable_world_pr: Changes the background panorama into a preview of the latest played world
Adds a button to the top right of the main menu screen to toggle between the panorama and world preview
config.aether.client.gui.layout_perks_x: The x-coordinate of the perks button layout when in the pause menu
config.aether.client.gui.layout_perks_y: The y-coordinate of the perks button layout when in the pause menu
config.aether.client.gui.menu_type_toggl: Determines that menu elements will align left if the menu's world preview is active, if true, this overrides 'Align menu elements left'
config.aether.client.gui.portal_text_y: The y-coordinate of the Ascending to the Aether and Descending from the Aether text in loading screens
config.aether.client.miscellaneous.enabl: Enables a direct join button for the official server
config.aether.client.miscellaneous.shoul: Disables the Cumulus menu selection screen button on launch
config.aether.client.rendering.colder_li: Removes warm-tinting of the lightmap in the Aether, giving the lighting a colder feel
config.aether.client.rendering.disable_a: Disables the Aether's custom skybox in case you have a shader that is incompatible with custom skyboxes
config.aether.client.rendering.green_sun: Enables a green-tinted sunrise and sunset in the Aether, similar to the original mod
config.aether.client.rendering.legacy_mo: Changes 西风啸云 and 云鲸 rendering to use their old models from the b1.7.3 version of the mod
config.aether.common.data_pack.add_ruine: Sets the Aether Ruined Portals data pack to be added to new worlds automatically
config.aether.common.data_pack.add_tempo: Sets the Aether Temporary Freezing data pack to be added to new worlds automatically
config.aether.common.gameplay.enable_sta: When the player enters the Aether, they are given a Book of Lore and 金黄云落伞s as starting loot
config.aether.common.gameplay.repeat_sun: Determines whether the 烈阳巨灵's dialogue when meeting him should play through every time you meet him
config.aether.common.gameplay.show_patre: Determines if a message that links The Aether mod's Patreon should show
config.aether.common.gameplay.start_with: On world creation, the player is given an 天境传送门 Frame item to automatically go to the Aether with
config.aether.common.gameplay.use_curios: Use the default Curios menu instead of the Aether's Accessories Menu. WARNING: Do not enable this without emptying your equipped accessories
config.aether.server.gameplay.berry_bush: Makes Berry Bushes and Bush Stems behave consistently with Sweet Berry Bushes
config.aether.server.gameplay.cloud_staf: Determines the cooldown in ticks for the Cloud Staff's ability
config.aether.server.gameplay.edible_amb: 神能晶片s can be eaten to restore a half heart of health
config.aether.server.gameplay.enable_bed: Vanilla's beds will explode in the Aether
config.aether.server.gameplay.hammer_of_: Determines the cooldown in ticks for the Hammer of Kingbdogz's ability
config.aether.server.gameplay.healing_gu: 史维特软糖s when eaten restore full health instead of full hunger
config.aether.server.gameplay.maximum_li: Determines the limit of the amount of Life Shards a player can consume to increase their health
config.aether.server.gameplay.tools_debu: Tools that aren't from the Aether will mine Aether blocks slower than tools that are from the Aether
config.aether.server.loot.spawn_golden_f: Allows the Golden Feather to spawn in the 白银地牢 loot table
config.aether.server.loot.spawn_valkyrie: Allows the 女武神披风 to spawn in the 白银地牢 loot table
config.aether.server.modpack.disable_aet: Prevents the 天境传送门 from being created normally in the mod
config.aether.server.modpack.disable_ete: Removes eternal day so that the Aether has a normal daylight cycle even before defeating the 烈阳巨灵
config.aether.server.modpack.disable_fal: Prevents the player from falling back to the Overworld when they fall out of the Aether
config.aether.server.modpack.portal_dest: Sets the ID of the dimension that the 天境传送门 will send the player to
config.aether.server.modpack.portal_retu: Sets the ID of the dimension that the 天境传送门 will return the player to
config.aether.server.modpack.spawn_in_ae: Spawns the player in the Aether dimension; this is best enabled alongside other modpack configuration to avoid issues
config.aether.server.multiplayer.balance: Makes the 隐形斗篷 more balanced in PVP by disabling equipment invisibility temporarily after attacks
config.aether.server.multiplayer.invisib: Sets the time in ticks that it takes for the player to become fully invisible again after attacking when wearing an 隐形斗篷; only works with 'Balance 隐形斗篷 for PVP'
config.aether.server.multiplayer.sun_alt: Makes it so that only whitelisted users or anyone with permission level 4 can use the 日轮祭坛 on a server
config.aether.server.world_generation.ge: Determines whether Holiday Trees should always be able to generate when exploring new chunks in the Aether, if true, this overrides 'Generate Holiday Trees seasonally'

Determines whether Holiday Trees should be able to generate during the time frame of December and January when exploring new chunks in the Aether, only works if 'Generate Holiday Trees always' is set to false
Determines whether the Aether should generate Tall Grass blocks on terrain or not
death.attack.aether.floating_block: %1$s was squashed by a floating block
death.attack.aether.floating_block.playe: %1$s was squashed by a floating block whilst fighting %2$s
gui.aether.customization.title: Customization
gui.aether.moa_skins.pack.lifetime_valky: Lifetime 女武神 恐鸟皮肤
gui.aether.moa_skins.text.donate: Donate to the project to get 恐鸟皮肤！
gui.aether.moa_skins.text.reward: Thank you for donating to the project!
gui.aether.moa_skins.title: 恐鸟皮肤
gui.aether.moa_skins.tooltip.access.life: Pledging to the %s tier will give you lifetime access to this skin!
gui.aether.moa_skins.tooltip.access.pled: Pledging to the %s tier will give you access to this skin during the pledge duration!
gui.aether.moa_skins.tooltip.lifetime: You have lifetime access to this skin!
gui.aether.moa_skins.tooltip.pledging: You have access to this skin while pledging to the %s tier!
gui.aether.patreon.note: This message will only display once.
gui.aether.player.dialog.deny_fight: On second thought, I'd rather not.
gui.aether.player.dialog.have_medals: I'm ready, I have the medals right here!
gui.aether.player.dialog.no_medals: I'll return when I have them.
gui.aether.player.dialog.question: What can you tell me about this place?
gui.aether.queen.dialog.answer: This is a sanctuary for us 女武神s who seek rest.
gui.aether.queen.dialog.challenge: Very well then. Bring me ten medals from my subordinates to prove your worth, then we'll see.
gui.aether.queen.dialog.defeated: You are truly... a mighty warrior...
gui.aether.queen.dialog.deny_fight: So be it then. Goodbye adventurer.
gui.aether.queen.dialog.fight: This will be your final battle!
gui.aether.queen.dialog.peaceful: Sorry, I don't fight with weaklings.
gui.aether.queen.dialog.ready: If you wish to challenge me, strike at any time.
gui.aether.queen.title: the 女武神女王
gui.aether.slider.message.attack.invalid: Hmm. Perhaps I need to attack it with a镐?
gui.aether.slider.title: 滑动魔石
gui.aether.sun_spirit.dead: Such bitter cold... is this the feeling... of pain?
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line0: You are certainly a brave soul to have entered this chamber.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line1: Begone human, you serve no purpose here.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line10: Did your previous death not satisfy your curiosity, human?
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line2: Your presence annoys me. Do you not fear my burning aura?
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line3: I have nothing to offer you, fool. Leave me at peace.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line4: Perhaps you are ignorant. Do you wish to know who I am?
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line5.1: I am a sun spirit, embodiment of Aether's eternal daylight. As
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line5.2: long as I am alive, the sun will never set on this world.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line6.1: My body burns with the anger of a thousand beasts. No man,
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line6.2: hero, or villain can harm me. You are no exception.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line7.1: You wish to challenge the might of the sun? You are mad.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line7.2: Do not further insult me or you will feel my wrath.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line8: This is your final warning. Leave now, or prepare to burn.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.line9: As you wish, your death will be slow and agonizing.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.playerdeath: Such is the fate of a being who opposes the might of the sun.
gui.aether.sun_spirit.title: 烈阳巨灵
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.1: What's that? You want to fight? Aww, what a cute little human.
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.2: You're not thinking of fighting a big, strong 女武神 are you?
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.3: I don't think you should bother me, you could get really hurt.
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.attack.1: I'm not going easy on you!
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.medal.1: Umm... that's a nice pile of medallions you have there...
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.medal.2: That's pretty impressive, but you won't defeat me.
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.medal.3: You think you're a tough guy, eh? Well, bring it on!
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.playerdeath.1: You want a medallion? Try being less pathetic.
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.playerdeath.2: Maybe some day, %s... maybe some day.
gui.aether.valkyrie.dialog.playerdeath.3: Humans aren't nearly as cute when they're dead.
itemGroup.aether.equipment_and_utilities: 天境丨工具与实用物品
lore.block.aether.aerogel: The result of the Aether's unique climate and lava combining. These blocks can be crafted into various decorative blocks and are blast-resistant.
lore.block.aether.aerogel_slab: 由气凝胶合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.aerogel_stairs: 由气凝胶合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.aerogel_wall: 由气凝胶合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.aether_dirt: A pale dirt. It can be found in the Aether and can also be used to grow native trees. It can grow into grass with enough light.
lore.block.aether.aether_dirt_path: A type of path made from flattening 天壤 with a锹. These can be good for long roads or just exterior gardens.
lore.block.aether.aether_farmland: Farmland tilled from 天壤; one of the few uses for锄s in the Aether.
lore.block.aether.aether_grass_block: Grass found in the Aether dimension. It can be used to grow trees native to the Aether. It is much more pale than normal grass.
lore.block.aether.altar: Used to enchant items and repair armor. They are powered by 神能晶片s.
lore.block.aether.ambrosium_block: A block of pure ambrosium. These are useful for storing large quantities of fuel.
lore.block.aether.ambrosium_ore: The most common ore in the Aether. The ore's drops can be doubled with skyroot tools.
lore.block.aether.ambrosium_torch: The main light source in the Aether, made from a 天根木棍 and 神能晶片.
lore.block.aether.angelic_slab: 由天灵石合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.angelic_stairs: 由天灵石合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.angelic_stone: 天灵石 is the main block that makes up 白银地牢s. There is a chance some of them can be traps when generated in dungeons, but you cannot collect them as traps. It is unbreakable until you have defeated the boss, but it's worth it for that block.
lore.block.aether.angelic_wall: 由天灵石合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.berry_bush: These bushes can be found all over the Aether. They provide Blue Berries when broken and then turn into bare stems. If placed on Enchanted Aether Grass, the drops are doubled.
lore.block.aether.berry_bush_stem: This is the result of harvesting the Blue Berries from a Berry Bush. It can take some time for them to grow back.
lore.block.aether.blue_aercloud: A pale blue cloud found close to the ground. It has very bouncy properties and can help you reach high places.
lore.block.aether.carved_slab: 由雕纹石合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.carved_stairs: 由雕纹石合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.carved_stone: The stone found in 青铜地牢s. This stone has a gray color to it and can be mined as a decorative block.
lore.block.aether.carved_wall: 由雕纹石合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.chest_mimic: It may look like a normal chest, but it really isn't. As soon as you right-click on it, a 拟箱怪 will pop out! These appear in Bronze and 白银地牢s.
lore.block.aether.cold_aercloud: A cold cloud found in the skies of the Aether. It can be used to make 寒风云落伞s, and break drops that would otherwise be very dangerous.
lore.block.aether.crystal_fruit_leaves: 水晶树叶 that are home to White Apples.
lore.block.aether.crystal_leaves: Leaves that come from Crystal Trees, which generate on floating islands. Sometimes they have fruit on them that can cure 醺毒.
lore.block.aether.decorated_holiday_leav: 节庆树叶 that have been decorated with lovely little baubles for extra holiday cheer!
lore.block.aether.enchanted_aether_grass: An Aether Grass Block that has been enchanted to allow for increasing harvest rates of Blue Berries.
lore.block.aether.enchanted_gravitite: After putting 重力晶矿石 into an Altar and enchanting it, you get 神炼重力晶矿. This can be made into gravitite tools and armor. When powered with a redstone signal, 神炼重力晶矿 blocks will float into the air, similarly to 重力晶矿石.
lore.block.aether.freezer: You can freeze various items using this, such as aerclouds or Water桶s. Its source of power is 冰石.
lore.block.aether.golden_aercloud: A golden cloud found in small quantities, higher in the air than normal. The properties are similar to 寒风境云s, but the 金黄云落伞s they produce have much more durability.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_leaves: These golden leaves generate with 金橡木 Trees. They spawn golden particles in a radius of 5 blocks. They yield 金橡树树苗s and 天根木棍s when decayed.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_log: A 天根原木 which contains 金琥珀 inside. When broken with an斧, they drop 天根原木s, and if the斧 is 紫晶 or 重力晶, they will drop 金琥珀.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_sapling: These large saplings, when planted, will grow into huge 金橡木 Trees! You can use Bone Meal to speed up the process.
lore.block.aether.golden_oak_wood: A 天根原木 which contains 金琥珀 Inside. When broken with an斧, they drop 天根原木s, and if the斧 is 紫晶 or 重力晶, they will drop 金琥珀. Crafted to have bark on all sides.
lore.block.aether.gravitite_ore: This is the Aether's rarest ore. It has floating properties and will float upward when there is nothing above it. These can be enchanted into 神炼重力晶矿 blocks.
lore.block.aether.hellfire_slab: 由狱炎石合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.hellfire_stairs: 由狱炎石合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.hellfire_stone: A warm, red stone that makes up 90% of the 黄金地牢's interior. It cannot be destroyed until the 烈阳巨灵 is defeated.
lore.block.aether.hellfire_wall: 由狱炎石合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.holiday_leaves: Leaves on Holiday Trees! It snows near them, and there are always 礼物s nearby!
lore.block.aether.holystone: The Aether's native rock. It can be used in various ways, such as tool creation, construction, and being able to be crafted into 圣石砖.
lore.block.aether.holystone_brick_slab: 由圣石砖合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.holystone_brick_stairs: 由圣石砖合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.holystone_brick_wall: 由圣石砖合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.holystone_bricks: Used as a building material native to the Aether. It is made from 圣石 and is sturdier than it too.
lore.block.aether.holystone_button: 由圣石合成，是能启动机器和激活红石的按钮
lore.block.aether.holystone_pressure_pla: 由圣石合成，是能启动机器和激活红石的压力板。
lore.block.aether.holystone_slab: 由圣石合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.holystone_stairs: 由圣石合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.holystone_wall: 由圣石合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.icestone: 冰石 is a common ore that can be used as fuel for a Freezer. It can be used to freeze nearby liquids such as lava and water.
lore.block.aether.icestone_slab: 由冰石合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.icestone_stairs: 由冰石合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.icestone_wall: 由冰石合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.incubator: Used to incubate 恐鸟s. You use 神能晶火把es for the fuel. The process can take quite some time, but it is worth the wait once your 恐鸟 of choice hatches!
lore.block.aether.light_angelic_stone: The light version of 天灵石. It is less common than 天灵石, but it looks really nice as a decorative block.
lore.block.aether.light_hellfire_stone: The light version of 狱炎石. It can be found in 黄金地牢s along with 狱炎石, but like its counterpart, it cannot be collected until the boss is defeated.
lore.block.aether.mossy_holystone: A more aged 圣石, it is found near dungeons and has pale colored vines growing on it; very decorative.
lore.block.aether.mossy_holystone_slab: 由苔圣石合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.mossy_holystone_stairs: 由苔圣石合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.mossy_holystone_wall: 由苔圣石合成。可用作装饰性围栏和防御工程。非常适合阻拦可恶的闯入者！
lore.block.aether.pillar: The main part of the 白银地牢's decorative pillars; they spawn all around the dungeon and are excellent for building.
lore.block.aether.pillar_top: The top of the 白银地牢's decorative pillars; they look excellent and are great for building.
lore.block.aether.present: A wonderful holiday gift, open it for a surprise! Be careful, as there's a chance you could get ssssssurprised!
lore.block.aether.purple_flower: These pretty violet flowers can be found in large numbers around the Aether. They can be crafted into Purple Dye when placed in a Crafting Table.
lore.block.aether.quicksoil: A silky sand with extremely slippery properties. It can be seen floating on the side of the Aether's islands. Be careful around it, or you'll fall off.
lore.block.aether.quicksoil_glass: After enchanting 速沙, you can get this tinted glass. It is slightly slippery and makes for a great window.
lore.block.aether.quicksoil_glass_pane: A thin decorative variant of 速沙玻璃. It is slightly slippery and makes for a great window.
lore.block.aether.sentry_stone: The light version of 雕纹石, also found in 青铜地牢s.
lore.block.aether.skyroot_bed: Crafted with wool and 天根木板. You can only sleep at night to skip nighttime, but during the day you can set your respawn point in the Aether. You cannot sleep while monsters are nearby.
lore.block.aether.skyroot_bookshelf: 由天根木板和书合成。书架能够提升附魔台的附魔能力。
lore.block.aether.skyroot_button: 由天根木板合成，是能启动机器和激活红石的按钮
lore.block.aether.skyroot_door: 由天根木板合成。门是装饰精美的通道，在维持空间密闭而安全和防范怪物进入方面很有用！
lore.block.aether.skyroot_fence: 由天根木板和天根木棍合成。栅栏极其适合保护家畜免受游荡的掠食者威胁！
lore.block.aether.skyroot_fence_gate: 由天根木板和天根木棍合成。为你珍贵的围场提供了出入方式。
lore.block.aether.skyroot_hanging_sign: 由去皮天根原木和锁链合成。告示牌是记录信息和指引的完美之选。
lore.block.aether.skyroot_leaves: These leaves generate with 天根木 Trees. They can drop 天根树苗s and 天根木棍s when decaying.
lore.block.aether.skyroot_log: These spawn with 天根木 Trees. They can be double-dropped with 天根木斧s. When put in a Crafting Table, they will provide 4 天根木板.
lore.block.aether.skyroot_planks: 天根木板 can be made into various tools, blocks, and items. They are crafted from 天根原木s and make a great building material.
lore.block.aether.skyroot_pressure_plate: 由天根木板合成。是能启动机器和激活红石的木压力板。
lore.block.aether.skyroot_sapling: These small green saplings will grow into 天根木 Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether.skyroot_sign: 由天根木板和天根木棍合成。告示牌是记录信息和指引的完美之选。
lore.block.aether.skyroot_slab: 由天根木板合成。台阶是半格高的方块，常用于装饰和建造缓坡。试着用它去建造屋顶吧！
lore.block.aether.skyroot_stairs: 由天根木板合成。楼梯能让建筑更显陡峭，也经常被用作装饰！
lore.block.aether.skyroot_trapdoor: 由天根木板合成。活板门能够将通道缩减为单格宽。它们常用作楼道的额外防护措施。
lore.block.aether.skyroot_wood: 天根原木s crafted to be smooth on all sides. When put in a Crafting Table, they will provide 4 天根木板.
lore.block.aether.stripped_skyroot_log: A 天根原木 that has had its bark stripped away with an斧. When put in a Crafting Table, they will provide 4 天根木板.
lore.block.aether.stripped_skyroot_wood: 去皮天根原木s crafted to be smooth on all sides. When put in a Crafting Table, they will provide 4 天根木板.
lore.block.aether.sun_altar: An altar containing the power to control the sun itself! It is dropped by the 烈阳巨灵 after you defeat him. Use it to control the time of day.
lore.block.aether.treasure_chest: A 藏宝箱, these are found after defeating a Bronze, Silver, or Gold dungeon. They can be opened with the key from the dungeon boss.
lore.block.aether.white_flower: These extremely good-smelling roses can make great gifts to a friend or loved one. They spawn in large groups around the Aether.
lore.block.aether.zanite_block: A block of compacted 紫晶 Gemstones. They can power beacons and have a sleek look to them.
lore.block.aether.zanite_ore: A slightly rare ore that drops 紫晶 Gemstones when broken with stone tools.
lore.item.aether.aechor_petal: The petal of an 箭毒花; they have a sweet aroma to them. These are a 恐鸟's favorite food and can be used to feed baby 恐鸟s.
lore.item.aether.aether_portal_frame: A portable frame containing the power to travel to the Aether or back to the Overworld. Not something you're likely to find naturally.
lore.item.aether.agility_cape: A slightly rare披风 found in Bronze and 白银地牢s. It makes the wearer's legs stronger, therefore they can walk up blocks instantly.
lore.item.aether.ambrosium_shard: The Aether's Coal equivalent. These have the healing property of restoring a small amount of health when eaten.
lore.item.aether.black_moa_egg: An egg laid by a Black 恐鸟. Hatching this provides a Black 恐鸟 with 8 mid-air jumps, the best and most rare one!
lore.item.aether.blue_berry: Harvested from Berry Bushes, this is the most common food source in the Aether. It has very weak hunger restoration. You can enchant these in an Altar for much better hunger restoration.
lore.item.aether.blue_cape: A Blue披风 that has a silky feeling to it. It's crafted using Blue Wool.
lore.item.aether.blue_gummy_swet: A sweet-smelling gummy, it can be found in random chests in Bronze and Silver dungeons. It fully restores the player's hunger when eaten. Very useful for boss fights.
lore.item.aether.blue_moa_egg: An egg laid by a Blue 恐鸟. Hatching this provides a Blue 恐鸟 with 3 mid-air jumps. The most common 恐鸟.
lore.item.aether.book_of_lore: A large book containing many lore entries. It describes every object in detail.
lore.item.aether.bronze_dungeon_key: A dull key that is dropped from the 滑动魔石 after being defeated. You can use it to claim the treasure you earned!
lore.item.aether.candy_cane: Dropped by mobs killed with a 拐杖糖剑! They can be used to repair this weapon, and they're a very tasty treat.
lore.item.aether.candy_cane_sword: A剑 made from decorative candy. Randomly drops 拐杖糖s when used. These are dropped from presents that are under Holiday Trees.
lore.item.aether.chainmail_gloves: A very rare pair of护手, needed to complete the chain armor set.
lore.item.aether.cloud_staff: A staff with a light and fluffy top. It summons small Cloud Minions to fight next to the user for a short period of time by shooting large Cloud Crystals.
lore.item.aether.cold_parachute: A quickly made 云落伞. It's fluffy to the touch and is made from 寒风境云s. It has one use.
lore.item.aether.diamond_gloves: A pair of护手, needed to complete the diamond armor set.
lore.item.aether.enchanted_berry: An excellent food source, it tastes quite good and restores a massive amount of hunger.
lore.item.aether.enchanted_dart: The ammo for Enchanted Dart Shooters. This is the strongest of the darts, made by enchanting Golden Darts.
lore.item.aether.enchanted_dart_shooter: A Dart Shooter that shoots Enchanted Darts; the strongest one!
lore.item.aether.flaming_sword: An ancient剑 which flames its foes to a burning crisp. It almost：受伤 to touch! Using this on animals can make them drop cooked meat!
lore.item.aether.gingerbread_man: Found in presents under Holiday Trees, these are the most common holiday item. They are very abundant when dropped from 礼物s.
lore.item.aether.gold_dungeon_key: A key that has a shiny finish. It is dropped by the 烈阳巨灵 after you defeat him. You can use it to claim the legendary treasure in the back room!
lore.item.aether.golden_amber: These round golden orbs can be obtained by mining 金橡木原木s with a 紫晶 or 重力晶斧. Their main purpose is to craft Golden Darts and Dart Shooters.
lore.item.aether.golden_dart: The ammo for Golden Dart Shooters. Crafted with 天根木棍s and 金琥珀, enchanting these converts them to Enchanted Darts.
lore.item.aether.golden_dart_shooter: A Dart Shooter that shoots Golden Darts; enchanting it on an Altar improves its attack power!
lore.item.aether.golden_feather: A fluffy feather found in 白银地牢s. When worn, the wearer becomes lighter than air and can descend slowly.
lore.item.aether.golden_gloves: A pair of护手, needed to complete the golden armor set.
lore.item.aether.golden_gummy_swet: A sour-tasting gummy, it can be found in random chests in Bronze and 白银地牢s. It fully restores the player's hunger when eaten. Very useful for boss fights.
lore.item.aether.golden_parachute: The best 云落伞 in the Aether. It has 20 uses and is made with 金黄境云s.
lore.item.aether.golden_pendant: An aesthetic accessory made of gold.
lore.item.aether.golden_ring: An aesthetic accessory made of gold.
lore.item.aether.gravitite_axe: Part of the Aether's best tool tier. This斧 not only makes wood blocks float, but it can mine 金橡木原木s for 金琥珀!
lore.item.aether.gravitite_boots: Part of the Aether's best armor set. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump!
lore.item.aether.gravitite_chestplate: Part of the Aether's best armor set. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump!
lore.item.aether.gravitite_gloves: Part of the Aether's best armor set, needed to complete the gravitite set.
lore.item.aether.gravitite_helmet: Part of the Aether's best armor set. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump!
lore.item.aether.gravitite_hoe: Part of the Aether's best tool tier. It can be used to harvest many plant based or organic blocks and can also make them float.
lore.item.aether.gravitite_leggings: Part of the Aether's best armor set. When the full set is worn, you get an extra high jump!
lore.item.aether.gravitite_pickaxe: Part of the Aether's best tool tier. When mining with this powerful tool, you can right-click on any stone block, and it will levitate into the air! You can mine any ore with this镐.
lore.item.aether.gravitite_shovel: Part of the Aether's best tool tier. This锹 has the special ability to make dirt blocks or sand levitate! When combined with enchantments such as Efficiency, it will instantly break 天壤!
lore.item.aether.gravitite_sword: Part of the Aether's best tool tier. When attacking with this powerful weapon, anything you hit will be flung into the air, causing lots of damage!
lore.item.aether.hammer_of_jeb: A mysterious hammer that can shoot projectiles. At one point, it vanished from existence. It's said this was actually Jeb's hammer at one point.
lore.item.aether.hammer_of_kingbdogz: A mighty hammer that shoots heavy projectiles at mobs. It's said that Kingbdogz actually held this hammer.
lore.item.aether.healing_stone: Obtained from enchanting 圣石, it can be used as a reliable healing source, providing Regeneration. It has a surprisingly juicy flavor.
lore.item.aether.holy_sword: An ancient剑 which does heavy amounts of damage to undead foes. A perfect weapon for traversing the Overworld.
lore.item.aether.holystone_axe: One of Aether's stone tools. It mines faster than skyroot tools, as well as dropping random 神能晶片s.
lore.item.aether.holystone_hoe: One of the Aether's stone tools. It can be used to harvest many plant based or organic blocks, and till dirt blocks into farmable land. It will randomly drop 神能晶片s during use.
lore.item.aether.holystone_pickaxe: One of the Aether's stone tools. It can mine 紫晶矿石 and will randomly drop 神能晶片s while mining.
lore.item.aether.holystone_shovel: One of the Aether's stone tools. It can mine 速沙 and all other blocks a Stone锹 can mine, except it drops random 神能晶片s.
lore.item.aether.holystone_sword: One of the Aether's stone tools. It can drop 神能晶片s at random while attacking.
lore.item.aether.ice_pendant: A吊坠 which allows you to freeze water and lava when walked on.
lore.item.aether.ice_ring: A戒指 which allows you to freeze water and lava when walked on.
lore.item.aether.invisibility_cloak: A cloak that makes the wearer completely invisible! Since mobs cannot see you, they cannot attack you. Sneak up on your enemies with it!
lore.item.aether.iron_bubble: A common dungeon loot item. It allows for the wearer to breathe underwater indefinitely.
lore.item.aether.iron_gloves: A pair of护手, needed to complete the iron armor set.
lore.item.aether.iron_pendant: An aesthetic accessory made of iron.
lore.item.aether.iron_ring: An aesthetic accessory made of iron.
lore.item.aether.leather_gloves: Dyeable护手 to match your Leather Tunic! This is needed to complete the leather armor set.
lore.item.aether.life_shard: A very rare item found in 黄金地牢s. Using this will give you an extra permanent heart! The feeling of using it is very strange and hard to describe.
lore.item.aether.lightning_knife: Small knives that, when thrown, summon lightning bolts where they land.
lore.item.aether.lightning_sword: An ancient剑 which summons lightning to its foes.
lore.item.aether.music_disc_aether_tune: A music disc that plays "Aether Tune" by Noisestorm.
lore.item.aether.music_disc_ascending_da: A music disc that plays "Ascending Dawn" by Emile van Krieken.
lore.item.aether.music_disc_chinchilla: A music disc that plays "chinchilla" by RENREN.
lore.item.aether.music_disc_high: A music disc that plays "high" by RENREN.
lore.item.aether.nature_staff: A staff that can allow for commanding tamed 恐鸟s. It can allow them to sit on the ground.
lore.item.aether.neptune_boots: Found in 青铜地牢s, this armor allows for faster swimming in water. The full set is a much better replacement for the Depth Strider enchantment.
lore.item.aether.neptune_chestplate: Found in 青铜地牢s, this armor allows for faster swimming in water. Combined with an Iron Bubble, this armor set is super useful for defeating underwater temples.
lore.item.aether.neptune_gloves: Found in 青铜地牢s, these gloves are required to complete the 海皇 armor set, which allows for underwater walking.
lore.item.aether.neptune_helmet: Found in 青铜地牢s, this armor allows faster swimming in water. Combined with an Iron Bubble, this armor set is super useful for defeating underwater temples.
lore.item.aether.neptune_leggings: Found in 青铜地牢s, this armor allows faster swimming in water. Combined with an Iron Bubble, this armor set is super useful for defeating underwater temples.
lore.item.aether.netherite_gloves: A pair of护手, needed to complete the Netherite armor set.
lore.item.aether.obsidian_boots: A super powerful piece of armor, more powerful than diamond. This armor is only obtainable by standing in water while wearing 凤凰 armor, converting it to obsidian.
lore.item.aether.obsidian_chestplate: A super powerful piece of armor, more powerful than diamond. This armor is only obtainable by standing in water while wearing 凤凰 armor, converting it to obsidian.
lore.item.aether.obsidian_gloves: Needed to complete the obsidian armor set, you can obtain these by standing in water while wearing 凤凰护手.
lore.item.aether.obsidian_helmet: A super powerful piece of armor, more powerful than diamond. This armor is only obtainable by standing in water while wearing 凤凰 armor, converting it to obsidian.
lore.item.aether.obsidian_leggings: A super powerful piece of armor, more powerful than diamond. This armor is only obtainable by standing in water while wearing 凤凰 armor, converting it to obsidian.
lore.item.aether.phoenix_boots: Found in 黄金地牢s, when fully worn, this armor set allows for fire resistance; you can swim in lava as well. Be careful when standing in water, as it will turn into obsidian armor.
lore.item.aether.phoenix_bow: Found as dungeon loot, this bow is very heated and can shoot flaming Arrows! It's warm to the touch.
lore.item.aether.phoenix_chestplate: Found in 黄金地牢s, when fully worn, this armor set allows for fire resistance; you can swim in lava as well. Be careful when standing in water, as it will turn into obsidian armor.
lore.item.aether.phoenix_gloves: Found in 黄金地牢s, these护手 are required to finish the 凤凰 armor set. If you stand in water for long enough, they will turn into 黑曜石护手.
lore.item.aether.phoenix_helmet: Found in 黄金地牢s, when fully worn, this armor set allows for fire resistance; you can swim in lava as well. Be careful when standing in water, as it will turn into obsidian armor.
lore.item.aether.phoenix_leggings: Found in 黄金地牢s, when fully worn, this armor set allows for fire resistance; you can swim in lava as well. Be careful when standing in water, as it will turn into obsidian armor.
lore.item.aether.pig_slayer: Kills any Pig-type mob with nothing with a single blow, or stronger ones with a couple blows. But why would you want to do that? Great for traversing the Nether.
lore.item.aether.poison_dart: The ammo for Poison Dart Shooters, these are made by coating Golden Darts with poison!
lore.item.aether.poison_dart_shooter: A Dart Shooter that shoots Poison Darts. Shooting this at something infects them with a deadly poison!
lore.item.aether.red_cape: A rough-feeling披风 that is crafted using Red Wool.
lore.item.aether.regeneration_stone: A treasure found in 白银地牢s. This stone makes the wearer feel healthy and heals their wounds. The effects can stack with other Regeneration Stones.
lore.item.aether.sentry_boots: Found in 青铜地牢s, these靴子 protect you from fall damage, allowing you to fall from great heights.
lore.item.aether.shield_of_repulsion: A shield that protects the user from most projectiles. It will reflect the projectile back at the thrower and cause damage to them. Each time a projectile is reflected, the shield will be damaged.
lore.item.aether.silver_dungeon_key: A reflective key that is given to you by the 女武神女王 after defeating her. Use it to claim the treasure she left behind!
lore.item.aether.skyroot_axe: One of the Aether's wooden tools. It can be used to double 天根原木 drops. Simple but useful for beginners.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_axolotl_bucket: A 天根木桶 with a friendly Axolotl in it. Axolotls can be incredibly helpful aquatic partners. So, it's best to keep one on hand if you're exploring wet environments.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_boat: 虽然天境没有大面积的水体，但船只依然是冰上长距旅行的有用工具！
lore.item.aether.skyroot_bucket: A handcrafted bucket used to contain 箭毒花 poison, a nice remedy, or even just plain water!
lore.item.aether.skyroot_chest_boat: 后座带有便捷箱子的天根木船。极适用于水上长途运输大量物品，不过天境中大面积水体是出了名的难找。
lore.item.aether.skyroot_cod_bucket: A bucket with a Cod in it! Make sure to keep the water topped up or your new friend won't survive the journey home.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_hoe: One of the Aether's wooden tools, used to till dirt to allow for the planting of crops. It can also double the drops of many plant based or organic blocks.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_milk_bucket: A bucket full of fresh milk; drink it to heal potion effects.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_pickaxe: One of the Aether's wooden tools. When mining 圣石 or 神能晶矿石, the drops will be doubled. This is even better when combined with an enchantment such as Fortune when mining 神能晶片s!
lore.item.aether.skyroot_poison_bucket: A 天根木桶 that has been filled with a deadly poison. Better not drink it! It can be used to craft Poison Darts and Dart Shooters. Enchant it to cure the poison in it.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_powder_snow_buc: A 天根木桶 that has been filled with Powder Snow. With quick reactions, it can be used to break the deadliest of falls, even in the Nether!
lore.item.aether.skyroot_pufferfish_buck: A 天根木桶 with a Pufferfish inside. This item serves as a useful way to transport the defensive and poisonous Pufferfish.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_remedy_bucket: A 天根木桶 containing a soothing remedy. It has a strong smell. Drinking this will cure deadly poison.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_salmon_bucket: A 天根木桶 containing a Salmon. Useful for transporting live Salmon over long stretches of land.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_shovel: One of the Aether's wooden tools. It doubles 天壤 and 速沙 drops.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_stick: 由天根木板合成。 Used to create various tools and items. There's nothing else too special about it.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_sword: One of the Aether's wooden tools. It has a low amount of durability and doubles mob drops. It makes an excellent weapon for collecting food when combined with enchantments such as Looting and Fire Aspect.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_tadpole_bucket: A 天根木桶 with a Tadpole inside. Transporting a Tadpole to a new biome can change what type of Frog it grows up into!
lore.item.aether.skyroot_tropical_fish_b: A 天根木桶 containing a Tropical Fish. A helpful way to transport and catalog the numerous varieties of Tropical Fish.
lore.item.aether.skyroot_water_bucket: A 天根木桶 that is filled to the brim with water.
lore.item.aether.swet_ball: A gooey orb that is dropped from 天蓝史维特s. It can be used to fertilize soil. Another use is to put it alongside string to make a lead.
lore.item.aether.swet_cape: A common披风 that is found in 青铜地牢s. It allows for the wearer to ride 史维特s, as they become friendly when they see someone wearing it.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_axe: A tool unique to the 白银地牢. This斧 has a very far reach and very high attack power. You can use this to your advantage, but be warned, the attack cooldown is very high.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_boots: An armor unique to the 白银地牢. When fully worn, you are granted temporary flight. Quite useful for getting to high places.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_cape: A rare披风 that is found in 白银地牢s. When worn, the wearer becomes lighter than air and can descend slowly.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_chestplate: An armor unique to the 白银地牢. When fully worn, you are granted temporary flight. Quite useful for getting to high places.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_gloves: An armor unique to the 白银地牢. The护手 are needed to complete the armor set, which grants temporary flight.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_helmet: An armor unique to the 白银地牢. When fully worn, you are granted temporary flight. Quite useful for getting to high places.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_hoe: A tool unique to the 白银地牢. This锄 has an incredibly far reach, allowing you to pointlessly till dirt from a safe distance.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_lance: A tool unique to the 青铜地牢. This long-range weapon is very good for defeating 西风啸云s and 女武神女王s.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_leggings: An armor unique to the 白银地牢. When fully worn, you are granted temporary flight. Quite useful for getting to high places.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_pickaxe: A tool unique to the 白银地牢. This镐 is very useful when it comes to mining blocks from under islands, as it has a very far reach, almost double the normal reach! It is also quite useful for fighting the 滑动魔石.
lore.item.aether.valkyrie_shovel: A tool unique to the 白银地牢. This锹 can help you reach 速沙 from a safer distance; quite useful wouldn't you say?
lore.item.aether.vampire_blade: A mysterious剑 that has life-stealing abilities. Holding it just makes you feel creepily empty...
lore.item.aether.victory_medal: Proof of defeating a lesser 女武神. Use these to prove to the 女武神女王 you are worthy enough to fight her!
lore.item.aether.white_apple: One of the only known cures for the Aether's deadly poison. You can find them on Crystal Trees.
lore.item.aether.white_cape: A light and fluffy披风 that is made from White Wool.
lore.item.aether.white_moa_egg: An egg laid by a White 恐鸟. Hatching this provides a White 恐鸟 with 4 mid-air jumps. This 恐鸟 is decently rare.
lore.item.aether.yellow_cape: A bright Yellow披风 that is crafted using Yellow Wool.
lore.item.aether.zanite_axe: One of the Aether's mid-tier tools, you can mine wood faster than stone, and it will get even faster as the tool is worn down.
lore.item.aether.zanite_boots: Part of the zanite armor set, equivalent in protection to iron.
lore.item.aether.zanite_chestplate: Part of the zanite armor set, equivalent in protection to iron.
lore.item.aether.zanite_gemstone: The Aether's version of iron. These shiny purple gems can be made into tools and armor that increase in strength when used.
lore.item.aether.zanite_gloves: A pair of护手, needed to complete the zanite armor set.
lore.item.aether.zanite_helmet: Part of the zanite armor set, equivalent in protection to iron.
lore.item.aether.zanite_hoe: One of the Aether's mid-tier tools, It can be used to harvest many plant based or organic blocks. It will get even faster at harvesting as the tool is worn down.
lore.item.aether.zanite_leggings: Part of the zanite armor set, equivalent in protection to iron.
lore.item.aether.zanite_pendant: A吊坠 that allows you to mine faster. It doesn't last for long, so use it wisely!
lore.item.aether.zanite_pickaxe: One of the Aether's mid-tier tools, it mines what iron can, except as its durability decreases, it gets faster. Be careful though, as when it's repaired it will be as slow as before!
lore.item.aether.zanite_ring: A戒指 which allows you to mine faster. It doesn't last for long, so use it wisely!
lore.item.aether.zanite_shovel: One of the Aether's mid-tier tools, as you mine 天壤 and 速沙, the durability will decrease and the锹 will get faster. If you wait long enough, it will start breaking blocks instantly! Be careful repairing it, as it will be slower when there is more durability.
lore.item.aether.zanite_sword: One of the Aether's mid-tier tools, the attack damage on this剑 starts at iron level and will increase up to twice as strong as it loses durability.
